long_description: Every adventurer needs a good hat. The REI Vented Sahara Outback Hat shields you from the sun, keeps rain out of your eyes and uses mesh ventilation to help keep you cool on hot summer days. Nylon fabric provides UPF 50+ protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Polyester mesh vent at the back of the hat helps keep your head cool on hot days. Partially recycled polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes when things heat up. Foam in the top of the crown will keep the REI Vented Sahara Outback Hat afloat in water.
short_description: Every adventurer needs a good hat. The REI Vented Sahara Outback Hat shields you from the sun, keeps rain out of your eyes and uses mesh ventilation to help keep you cool on hot summer days.
